entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
